String1: Your browser does not support push notifications.
String7: You will be notified with a push notification when a new bundle appears.
String9: You will be notified with a push notification when a new paid game is temporarily available for free.
String11: You will be notified with a push notification when new games appear on subscription services that can be redeemed on platforms such as Steam or GOG.
String13: You will be notified with a push notification when there is any new news related to the website such as updates or changes.
String15: You will be notified with a push notification when relevant news appears on the website and these are not from the previous categories.
String17: You will be notified with a push notification when a game on your wishlist reaches a new historical low price.
String18: Note: To avoid spam, push notifications are only sent when the new historical price has a difference of at least 10 euro cents compared to the previous price.
